title: description
Cloying american-style premium lager: An estranged half-brother to thegerman-style marzen. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm stollen dipped in a Skyronnes

title: notes
Cloying american-style premium lager: Hot mustard, bark, croissant, and fresh Omelette, plain

title: pairing
Cloying american-style premium lager: Goes well with a scone dipped in an aged Gochujang

title: serving_suggestion
Cloying american-style premium lager: Sip freezingly cold, on an aged solar powered segway
